lead_paragraph: MAROARET GARRITY, an Irish girl recently in the employment of CHARLES M. SUUKER, an inn keeper, has been on trial during the week before the Circuit Court at Newark, N. J., under an indictment for murder. The evidence thus far elicited, exhibits the following history of the facts upon which the fearful charge rests.
abstract: Trial at Newark for murdering her Seducer
